Posts.EditableText:
Hi,

Im new here and Id like to know if its possible to export my games made in Quest to HTML to publish in my website.

Thanks!
Bruno

Posts.EditableText: Im still looking in documentation and, despite some of you wrote in another awnsers, I cannot find a good way to export my game to HTML. I'm probably doing something wrong, since I am new to the tool, but someone could show me how to do? I'm adapting 2 adventures that did in the 80s and would like to publish them on my website, besides the textadventures.co.uk. Thanks and sorry about my "engrish".
